## Mission Statement
I am a passionate and driven data scientist looking to apply my vast analytical experiences and knowledge to the world of sports analytics. My goal is to use a data-driven approach to provide competitive advantages to professional sports teams, identify new and innovative trends in sports analytics, and make a meaningful impact on the analytics industry as a whole.
